#summary setDisplayDigit Reference.
#labels Phase-Implementation

= setDisplayDigit Reference =

Set a single display to a digit.

{{{
void setDisplayDigit(byte digit, byte pos, boolean dot);
}}}

|| Argument || Detail || Default ||
|| digit|| The digit to set || _required_ ||
|| pos|| The 7-segment display to set. 0 for the leftmost, 8 for the rightmost || _required_ ||
|| dot|| The dot status for the display || _required_ ||

= Example =

Set the leftmost display to a "6.":
{{{
module1.setDisplayDigit(6, 0, true);
}}}
